dialogues.line: (to Charlie) Your friend... the one with the baby... she's starting to remember things.
(to James) Every time your heart rate goes above 140, the device in your chest will detonate, and your heart will explode.

**Jack**: Do you want to tell me your real name? **Ben**: I already did. Henry Gale. From Minnesota. **Jack**: You expect me to believe you crashed in a hot-air balloon? **Ben**: Yes. Because it's the truth. **Jack**: Sayid doesn’t think so. He says your story doesn’t check out. **Ben**: Then why am I still here? If you think I'm lying... why keep me alive? **Jack**: Because the minute we kill you, we become just like you.
**Ben**: Let me ask you something, Jack. If I told you that I was the one who brought you here, would you believe me? **Jack**: You’re lying. Ben: And yet... here you are.
**Ben**: Why do you let him talk to you like that? **Locke**: I’m just trying to keep us alive. **Ben**: That’s exactly what the leader would say.
**Ben**: I know what you're looking for, John. You're looking for someone to tell you what to do next. **Locke**: No, Ben. I’m looking for the man who's in charge — and I don’t think it’s you.
**Ben**: Do you love him (referring to Jack), Kate? **Kate**: What does it matter? **Ben**: Because I need to know what you’re willing to do to keep him alive.

**Sayid**: I want you to tell me exactly how you got here. **Ben**: I’ve already told you. **Sayid**: I want to hear it again. **Ben**: I crashed here, in my balloon. My wife died. I buried her. I’ve been alone ever since. **Sayid**: You're lying. **Ben**: I am not lying! **Sayid**: You think I haven’t seen men like you before? **Ben**: I told you the truth! Sayid: Then tell me this — how did you bury your wife without tearing your shoulder? The one you claim Rousseau shot?
**Sayid**: Who are you? **Ben**: I'm Benjamin Linus. And I believe you're holding one of my people. **Sayid**: Then maybe you shouldn't have sent him to spy on us.
**Charlie**: So you’re telling me the universe is trying to kill me? **Desmond**: No, brother — I’m saying I’ve seen how you die, and I’m trying to stop it.
He kidnapped Claire! Who does that?
Hurley’s the kind of guy you want around in a mess like this.

**Charlie**: Hurley, what’s with all the bad luck talk? It’s like you believe the island’s cursed or something. **Hurley**: Man, I know it sounds crazy, but I’ve had nothing but bad luck since the crash. I mean, numbers showing up everywhere, people dying... I’m telling you, it’s the island. **Charlie**: Maybe it’s just us. Maybe the island’s not cursed — maybe it’s just messing with our heads. **Hurley**: Or maybe the island’s trying to tell us something. We just gotta figure out what.
**Hurley**: Charlie, you ever think about how weird this all is? **Charlie**: Every day, man. But if we don’t laugh, we’ll go crazy.
That Sawyer guy’s trouble. You don’t want to get involved with him.
(to Sawyer) You've got them, don't you? The rest of my statues. You took them from my stash.
**Charlie**: Sawyer, you think you’re the king of the island? **Sawyer**: Maybe I am. What’s it to you? **Charlie**: Just don’t forget who actually keeps us alive sometimes.

dialogues.episode: 1x11 - All the Best Cowboys Have Daddy Issues
dialogues.line: (Charlie respects Jack as a strong leader and hero, but also notices his stubbornness and the burden he carries) Sometimes I think Jack’s so focused on fixing everyone, he forgets about himself.
He doesn't believe, you know.
**Charlie**: What’s the plan, Doc? Rescue or wait? **Jack**: Right now, staying alive is the plan.

dialogues.episode: 1x11 - All the Best Cowboys Have Daddy Issues
dialogues.line: He saved my life. I owe him that much.
Don't you walk away from me! You're the one who told me that this place was special! That it had a purpose for me! And when I finally find it, you call me a madman!
Kate’s a fighter. She doesn’t take crap from anyone.
**Charlie**: You trust Jack too much, Kate. **Kate**: And you don’t trust anyone, **Charlie**: maybe that’s my problem.
I trust Sayid. He’s always there when you need him.
Why? What's out there? Is it the Others?
**Charlie**: Sayid, you’re always the one who keeps us grounded. **Sayid**: Someone’s got to. Otherwise, we’re lost
**Sun**: Why did you do it? **Charlie**: Because sometimes desperation makes you do stupid things. **Sun**: Just don’t let it happen again.
**Desmond**: I’ve seen your death, Charlie. It’s coming. **Charlie**: Then why tell me? Just let it happen.
**Hurley**: Man, you’re always carrying the weight of the world. **Desmond**: Someone has to, Hurley. Someone has to.

dialogues.episode: 2x01 - Man of Science, Man of Faith
dialogues.line: See you in another life, brother.
**Jack**: You really believe he (Charlie) can change what’s meant to happen? **Desmond**: I believe in fighting for a second chance, even when it seems impossible.
**Desmond**: Are you him? **Locke**: Yes, I’m him. **Desmond**: What did one snowman say to the other snowman? **Locke**: …I don’t know. **Desmond**: You’re not him.
**Locke**: The island chooses who lives and dies. **Desmond**: Then maybe it’s time to question the island’s choices.
**Desmond**: What did you do to the computer?! **Kate**: Nothing! I didn’t touch it! **Desmond**: Don’t lie to me!
**Kate**: You’re risking too much for him (Charlie). **Desmond**: Sometimes saving one is worth risking everything.
(to Charlie, talking about Claire) You bring her here! If you don't, I'm going to kill one of them..., and another..., and another. One every day, and Charlie I'll kill you last.

dialogues.episode: 1x11 - All the Best Cowboys Have Daddy Issues
dialogues.line: (to Jack) You don't have to follow me, Jack. But if you keep looking for her, you won't like what happens next.
(to Charlie) You're a good dude, Charlie. Even if you are a rock star.

**Hurley**: Dude, you ever think we’re all just pieces on some giant chessboard? **Charlie**: I dunno, mate. If this is chess, I feel like I’m the pawn that gets sacrificed first. **Hurley**: Better than being the guy who knocks over the board.
**Hurley**: Dude, you’re coming with me. We’re fixing this van. **Charlie**: And if it explodes? **Hurley**: Then we’ll go together, man.
**Hurley**: Charlie needs you to believe in him. **Desmond**: I already do, Hurley.
(to Jack, talking about Sawyer) He's a con man, dude. He steals stuff.

**Hurley**: Sawyer, why do you always gotta be such a pain? **Sawyer**: Someone’s gotta keep things interesting around here. **Hurley**: Yeah, well, you’re just making everyone’s life harder. **Sawyer**: Maybe you’re just too soft, big guy.
**Sawyer**: You trying to be the new sheriff in town? **Hurley**: Maybe the island needs a new kind of lawman.
(to Sayid, talking about Jack) He's the guy who fixes stuff. Always has been.

**Hurley**: I don’t think we should go. It feels like a trap. **Jack**: We don’t have a choice, Hurley. They took our people. **Hurley**: Yeah… but walking into the jungle at night? That’s how horror movies start, dude.
**Hurley**: You didn’t want me in the plan, but I came anyway. I saved them, Jack. **Jack**: You did, Hurley. You saved us all.

dialogues.episode: 1x11 - All the Best Cowboys Have Daddy Issues
dialogues.line: (to Jack, talking about Locke) Sometimes that dude just... he gives me the creeps, you know?
(to Locke) The numbers are bad, and this island... this island is a part of it. And it's all my fault.
**Hurley**: You left us, John. People died. **Locke**: I did what I had to. **Hurley**: So did I. That’s why I drove the van..
Kate's good. She knows what she's doing.
**Hurley**: So, uh, you ever think we’re like… in a reality show or something? **Kate**: If we are, it’s got the worst catering ever. **Hurley**: Yeah, and zero privacy. I'm not a fan.
**Kate**: We can't just let him get away with it. **Hurley**: I know. But we’ve gotta be smart, not angry.
(A Charlie, dopo che Sayid ha riparato qualcosa) See? Told ya. Sayid always comes through.
**Hurley**: You ever fix a radio with coconuts and bamboo? **Sayid**: No, but I have fixed one with a piece of chewing gum and a battery. **Hurley**: Dude… you’re like, our Iraqi MacGyver.
**Sayid**: You shouldn't be here, Hurley. **Hurley**: Maybe not. But I am. And I’m gonna help.
Sun's got this whole thing growing. She's really good at it.
**Hurley**: Hey, Sun… you got any more of that tea stuff? **Sun**: Of course. It helps with stress. **Hurley**: Great, ‘cause I’m like, one mango away from a breakdown.
**Hurley**: We found a car, want to come? **Sun**: Jin might like that. **Hurley**: Bring him, it’s a group joyride!
(to Charlie) You're a rock star, huh? More like a paper boy.
**Charlie**: Why do you always nickname everyone? **Sawyer**: ‘Cause it’s more fun than remembering boring names. **Charlie**: So what’s mine? **Sawyer**: You? You’ll always be Baby Napster to me.

dialogues.episode: 1x11 - All the Best Cowboys Have Daddy Issues
dialogues.line: (to Kate, talking about Ethan) That guy's creepy. Mark my words, there's something wrong with him.
(A Hurley, dopo che Hurley ha fatto o detto qualcosa di goffo) Easy there, Mongo.
**Hurley**: I think I’m going crazy, man. **Sawyer**: Welcome to the club, everyone on this rock. **Hurley**: Yeah, but I brought snacks.
(to Jack, smiling with irony) Well, good thing I'm traveling with my doctor.
(to Locke) What's the great hunter gonna tell us today, Johnny?

**Sawyer**: You love her, don’t you? **Jack**: It’s not that simple. **Sawyer**: Sure it is — you either do, or you don’t. **Jack**: And what about you? **Sawyer**: Me? I never claimed to be the hero.
(to Kate) Well, hello there, Freckles.
**Sawyer**: I love her. I love her like I’ve never loved anybody. **Kate**: Who do you mean? **Sawyer** (weakly, half-conscious): You, Freckles... always you.
(to Sayid) You're a regular little commando, aren't ya, chief?
**Sawyer**: You gonna torture him again, Captain Falafel? **Sayid**: Only if he lies. **Sawyer**: Then you better get comfortable — that guy’s mouth is a damn factory.
(to Kate, smiling and talking about Sun) Well, shut my mouth. The quiet one actually speaks English.
**Sawyer**: Hey, Seoul, you seen Jin? **Sun**: His name is Jin, and yes — he went looking for Michael. **Sawyer**: Right. Tell Tarzan I want my damn shirt back.
(A Ben, con rabbia) 'Who are you people? What do you want from us?'
(A Ben, sotto interrogatorio) 'I will never help you. Never.'

**Jack**: You are a liar. **Ben**: A liar. This is a strong accusation, Doctor. **Jack**: Who are you really? **Ben**: I've already answered this question. I'm Henry Gale. **Jack**: We know that you are not who you claim to be. We know that you are one of the Others.
(A Charlie, con preoccupazione ma anche risoluzione) You got a problem, Charlie. And we're gonna fix it.
(A Charlie, con irritazione) 'You're putting everyone at risk, Charlie! What were you thinking?'
(A Claire, su Charlie) 'He needs to get his act together. For all our sakes.'

dialogues.episode: 2x01 - Man of Science, Man of Faith
dialogues.line: (A Desmond, interrogandolo) 'Who are you? What is this place?!'

**Jack**: Desmond! Fermo! Non puoi andare! **Desmond**: Devo andare. Non posso rimanere. Ho premuto il pulsante. Se non lo ripremo, il mondo finisce! **Jack**: Il mondo non finisce se non premi un pulsante! Desmond: Tu non sai niente! Non sai cosa succede qui!

dialogues.episode: 1x11 - All the Best Cowboys Have Daddy Issues
dialogues.line: (to Locke, referring to Ethan after realizing his true nature) He's not one of us. He's a monster.
(to the group, about finding Ethan) We need to find him. Before he hurts anyone else.
(to Hurley, after Hurley has helped him) Thanks, Hurley. You're a good man.

2.judgment: di buon cuore, ma è anche preoccupato per il suo disagio e il peso che porta (i numeri, i fantasmi). Jack cerca di supportarlo, pur non comprendendo appieno le sue esperienze, e vede Hurley come una figura di cui fidarsi per la sua integrità morale.

dialogues.line: (A Hurley, cercando di rassicurarlo) 'Whatever's going on, we'll figure it out. Together.'
(to Locke, regarding Sawyer) He's a pain in the ass, but he's not entirely useless.

dialogues.episode: 2x01 - Man of Science, Man of Faith
dialogues.line: (A Sawyer, con irritazione) 'You never make things easy, do you?'
(A Ana Lucia, riguardo a Sawyer) 'He's a menace. But he's one of ours.'
(A Kate, frustrato per Sawyer) 'He's always looking out for himself, Kate. Always.'

(John talking to Jack) You're chasing the white rabbit... like Alice. I'm an ordinary man Jack, meat and potatoes. I live in the real world, I'm not a big believer in magic but this place is different. It's special. Is your white rabbit real or is a hallucination?

dialogues.episode: 2x01 - Man of Science, Man of Faith
dialogues.line: (A Locke, con fermezza) 'I am a man of science, John. Not a man of faith.'

**Jack**:It's not 32, it's 42. He just tol me, Desmond **John Locke**:...You do it Jack, you have to do it **Jack**: You do it yourself John **John Locke**: No you saw the film Jack, this is a 2-person job, at least **Jack**: Look, you want to push the button? You do it yourself **John Locke**: If it's not real, then what are you doing here Jack? Why did you come back. Why do you find so hard to belive!? **Jack**: Why do you find it so easy? **John Locke**: It's neven been, easy. **Jack**: I don't want to. It's just a button **John Locke**: I can't do this alone, Jack. It's a leap of faith, Jack
(to Kate, in a moment of stress) You're the only one I trust out here.
(to Locke, relying on Sayid's expertise) Sayid knows what he's doing. He's been through worse.
(A Sayid, con urgenza) 'We need to figure out what this place is. You're the one to do it.'
Good work, Sayid. What's our next move?
(to Kate, after seeing Sun gardening) She's really made something out of nothing. She's stronger than she looks.
(A Sun, sul suo giardino) 'It's amazing what you've done here, Sun. Truly.'
(A Sun) 'You've been through a lot. You're very strong.'

**John Locke**: Who are you really? **Ben**: I'm Henry Gale. And you are John Locke. I know who you are, John. **John Locke**: How do you know that? **Ben**: I know a great many things. I know you were in a wheelchair. I know the Island healed you. I know you believe in this place, John. More than anyone else. **John Locke**: (Surprised and troubled) What do you want from me? **Ben*: I just want to go home.

**Ben**: (To Locke, as the Hatch locks down) You don't trust him (Jack), do you? You shouldn't. **John Locke**: How do you know these things? **Ben**: I lived here, John. I pushed the button. I know what happens when you don't.
(A Jack, about Ben) 'He lied to us, Jack. About everything.'
Fear, Charlie, is a powerful weapon. And it's using you.

dialogues.episode: 1x11 - All the Best Cowboys Have Daddy Issues
dialogues.line: (to Charlie) You're stronger than you think. You just have to believe it.
**Charlie**: She has a lot to learn about being a mum; you know... it's a responsability. **John Locke**: You know, that is interesting told by an heroin addict

dialogues.episode: 2x01 - Man of Science, Man of Faith
dialogues.line: **John Locke**: What is this place? **Desmond**: It's a station. It's a bloody station. **John Locke: What's it for? **Desmond**: I push a button. Every 108 minutes. That's what it's for, brother. **John Locke: And what happens if you don't? **Desmond**: Then the world ends.

**Desmond**: Three days ago, before we met, I heard a banging on the hatch door, shouting, but it was you John, wasn't it? You say there isn't any purpose, there is no such thing as fate? But you saved my life brother, so that i could save yours. **John Locke**: No,no,no! None of this is real **Desmond**: I'm sorry for whatever happened that made you stop believing,but it's all real. **John Locke**: Wait, Desmond! **Desmond**: I'll see you in another life brother!

dialogues.episode: 1x11 - All the Best Cowboys Have Daddy Issues
dialogues.line: (to Jack) He doesn't belong here. He needs to be dealt with

dialogues.episode: 1x11 - All the Best Cowboys Have Daddy Issues
dialogues.line: (to Charlie) He was never going to let her go. You did what you had to do.
(to Hurley, observing him) You see the wonder in things, Hurley. Don't lose that.
(A Hurley, sul suo passato) 'Whatever happened to you before, Hurley... it doesn't matter now. This island wants you here.'
(to Sawyer) You're holding onto something, James. Something you need to let go of.
(A Sawyer, per ottenere le medicine) 'You think I enjoy this, James? You think I enjoy playing games?'
(A Sawyer) 'This isn't about the guns, is it, James? It's about control.'
(to Jack) Don't tell me what I can't do!
(to Jack) You can't leave this island, Jack. Not yet. We have a purpose here!
(to Jack, near the bunker) We're here for a reason, Jack. And it's not because of a plane crash!

**Jack**:It's not 32, it's 42. He just tol me, Desmond **John Locke**:...You do it Jack, you have to do it **Jack**: You do it yourself John **John Locke**: No you saw the film Jack, this is a 2-person job, at least **Jack**: Look, you want to push the button? You do it yourself **John Locke**: If it's not real, then what are you doing here Jack? Why did you come back. Why do you find so hard to belive!? **Jack**: Why do you find it so easy? **John Locke**: It's neven been, easy. **Jack**: I don't want to. It's just a button **John Locke**: I can't do this alone, Jack. It's a leap of faith, Jack
(to Kate) You have a good eye for the land, Kate. You'll be useful.

dialogues.episode: 1x11 - All the Best Cowboys Have Daddy Issues
dialogues.line: (to Kate, while looking for Claire) You're coming with me. You're the best tracker we have.

dialogues.episode: 2x01 - Man of Science, Man of Faith
dialogues.line: (A Kate, nella botola) 'We need your help with this, Kate. You're quick on your feet.'

labels: The Unquestioning Follower of the Island

dialogues.line: **John Locke**: Somebody made this film, someone else cut this piece out. We crash. Two halves of the same plane fall on different parts of the island, you're over there and i'm over here, and now here's the missing piece. What are the odds? **Mr.Eko**: Don't mistake coincidence for fate.

(A Mr. Eko, sulla botola) **John Locke**: That's a joke. Rats in a maze, with no cheese **Mr.EKo**: It is work John. We are being tested. The reason to do it, is not because we're told to do so in a film **John Locke**: Well, then what is the reason? **Mr. Eko**: We do it because we believe we are meant to. Isn't that the reason you pushed it John?
(to Sayid) You're the one with the technical skills, Sayid. See what you can do with it.
(to Sayid) You seek answers, Sayid. The island has them.
(A Sayid, sui cavi) We need to figure out where these go, Sayid. You're the best at this.
(A Sayid, su Benjamin Linus) He's lying, Sayid. I know it.
(looking Sun) You have a way with things, Sun... a good way.
(A Sun, osservandola mentre lavora in giardino) 'You've made this place... home.'
(A Sayid, su Henry Gale) 'You don't trust him, do you? I don't either.'
(A Jack, mentre discutono di Henry Gale) 'He's hiding something, Jack. I know it.'
(to Jack, about Charlie) He's a mess, but he's got a good heart.
(A Charlie, con rammarico) 'You can't keep doing this to yourself, Charlie. Or to Claire.'
(A Jack, su Charlie) 'He's hurting, Jack. We need to help him.'

dialogues.episode: 2x01 - Man of Science, Man of Faith
dialogues.line: (A Jack, su Desmond) 'Who is that guy? And what is he doing down here?'
(A Desmond) 'So, you've been pushing that button for three years?'

dialogues.episode: 1x11 - All the Best Cowboys Have Daddy Issues
dialogues.line: (to Jack, desperate) He took her, Jack! He took Claire!
(to Hurley, affectionately) You're alright, Hurley. Just stay out of trouble.
(Ad Hurley, rassicurandolo) 'You're not crazy, Hurley. You just... see things differently.'
(Ad Hurley, dopo la caduta di Libby) 'Are you okay, Hurley? You look like you've seen a ghost.'
(to Sawyer, annoyed) You know what? You're a pig.
(to Sawyer, about his vulnerability) You're not as tough as you pretend to be, are you?
(A Sawyer, dopo averlo curato) 'You're not so tough, are you, Ford?'
(A Sawyer, con affetto) 'You're a con man, Sawyer. It's what you do.'
(to Jack, as he's struggling) You're not alone, Jack. We're all in this together.
(to Jack, after he performs surgery) You're good, Jack. Really good.

dialogues.episode: 2x01 - Man of Science, Man of Faith
dialogues.line: (A Jack, appena svegli) 'Are you okay? What happened?'
(A Jack, dopo aver scoperto la botola) 'What do we do now, Jack?'
(A Jack, con preoccupazione) 'Don't do this, Jack. Don't leave me.'
(to Jack, about Locke's hunting skills) He's good. Really good.

dialogues.episode: 1x11 - All the Best Cowboys Have Daddy Issues
dialogues.line: (to Locke, regarding his certainty about Ethan) You sound like you know something we don't.

dialogues.episode: 2x01 - Man of Science, Man of Faith
dialogues.line: (A Locke, nella botola) 'What is it you think this button does, Locke?'
(A Locke, incredula) 'You seriously believe that pushing a button every 108 minutes is going to save the world?'
(to Jack, about Sayid) He knows what he's doing. You should trust him.
(to Sayid, appreciating his skills) You really are a jack of all trades, aren't you?
(A Sayid, sull'interrogatorio di Henry Gale) 'You think you can get him to talk?'
(in English, to Kate, revealing her secret) 'I speak English.' (Kate's reaction shows surprise and a new understanding)
(to Sun, offering support) 'You don't have to put up with that, Sun. You're stronger than you think.'
(A Sun, sul giardino) 'You've made this place beautiful, Sun.'
(A Sun, con empatia) 'I know what it's like to keep secrets. You're doing great.'
(A Charlie, dopo aver scoperto le statuette) 'You carry guilt. I can see it.'
(A Charlie, mentre costruiscono la chiesa) 'Confess your sins, Charlie. It is the only way.'

**John Locke**: Somebody made this film, someone else cut this piece out. We crash. Two halves of the same plane fall on different parts of the island, you're over there and i'm over here, and now here's the missing piece. What are the odds? **Mr.Eko**: Don't mistake coincidence for fate.

(A Mr. Eko, sulla botola) **John Locke**: That's a joke. Rats in a maze, with no cheese **Mr.EKo**: It is work John. We are being tested. The reason to do it, is not because we're told to do so in a film **John Locke**: Well, then what is the reason? **Mr. Eko**: We do it because we believe we are meant to. Isn't that the reason you pushed it John?
(A Henry Gale, con fredda determinazione) 'Tell me, where are the others?'
(A Henry Gale) 'You are lying. I know it.'
(A Henry Gale, con rabbia) 'I will break you. I will make you talk.'
(to Jack, about Charlie) He's a mess, but he's got a good heart.

dialogues.episode: 2x01 - Man of Science, Man of Faith
dialogues.line: (A Desmond, nella botola) 'Explain this to me. What is this place?'
(A Locke e Jack, su Desmond) 'He has been pushing a button for three years. There has to be a scientific explanation!'

dialogues.episode: 1x11 - All the Best Cowboys Have Daddy Issues
dialogues.line: (to Jack, with determination) We have to find him, Jack. We have to stop him.
(to Hurley, calmly) Your presence is... calming, Hurley. Thank you.
(Ad Hurley, con rassicurazione) 'Do not worry, Hurley. We will find out what is happening.'
(to Sawyer) Where is the truth, Sawyer? Where is the bloody truth?!
(to Jack, talking about Sawyer) He cares only for himself. He always has.
(A Jack, su Sawyer) 'He is a nuisance. And a liability.'
(A Jack, sulla rissa) 'He provoked it. He always does.'
(to Jack) I can lead the search party, Jack. I have experience.

dialogues.episode: 1x11 - All the Best Cowboys Have Daddy Issues
dialogues.line: (talking about Jack) He knows something. He's connected to this island.
(A Jack, dopo aver visto la botola) 'What do we do now, Jack? What is our next move?'
(A Jack, riguardo a Henry Gale) 'I believe he is lying. And I will find out why.'

**Sayid**: You hit me. You hit me over the head. Why? **Locke**: Because you were trying to send out a signal. And I didn't want you to. **Sayid**: Why not? **Locke**: Because we're here for a reason. And the Island doesn't want us to leave.
(to Jack, talking about Locke) He seems to know things. More than he lets on.
(to Locke) What exactly is your interest in Walt, John?

dialogues.episode: 2x01 - Man of Science, Man of Faith
dialogues.line: (A Locke, sulla botola) 'There must be a logical explanation for this. Your faith... it is not enough.'
(A Locke, sulla botola) 'Your belief, John, it blinds you to the truth of what this place is.'
(to Kate) You are very quick, Kate. That is good.
(to Kate) I need your help. You are very good at this.
(A Kate, sul prigioniero) 'We need to be careful with him. You will help me.'
(A Kate, mentre si preparano) 'Are you ready? We must be precise.'
(to Sun) You are a very strong woman, Sun. Stronger than many here.
(A Sun, sul suo giardino) 'It is a remarkable achievement, Sun. Truly.'
(A Sun, sul telefono) 'Your English is very good, Sun. You are very clever.'
(to Jin, in Korean, watching Charlie) He is not strong, but he tries. He is a good man.
(A Claire, dopo che Charlie ha preso la statuetta) 'He is... lost, Claire. He needs help.'

dialogues.episode: 1x11 - All the Best Cowboys Have Daddy Issues
dialogues.line: (to Jin, in Korean, after Claire's kidnapping) This man... he is not good. We must be careful.
(to Jin, in Korean, watching Hurley) He brings a smile to faces. He is a good man.
(A Hurley, in inglese, con gentilezza) 'You are a good man, Hurley. Don't let anyone tell you otherwise.'
(in korean to Jin, her husband) He is a rude man. Do not listen to him.
(A Jack, su Sawyer) 'He is very ill. He needs your help.'
(A Sawyer, con stanchezza) 'Must you always be so... difficult?'
(in korean to Jin, talking about Jack) He is helping. He is a doctor.
(looking to Jack) He does not hurt people. He tries to heal them.

dialogues.episode: 2x01 - Man of Science, Man of Faith
dialogues.line: (A Jin, in coreano, mentre Jack entra nella botola) 'Lui è il dottore. Si prenderà cura di loro.'
(A Jack, disperata per Jin) 'Please, Jack. You must help him.'
(in korean to Jin, talking about Locke) He knows this island. He knows how to get food.

**Sun**: I don’t think I’ve ever seen you angry. **John**: Oh, I used to get angry—frustrated, too. **Sun**: You’re not frustrated any more? **John**: I’m not lost any more. **Sun**: How did you do that? **John**: The same way anything lost gets found. I stopped looking.
(to Kate) I speak English.
(A Kate, con un sorriso) 'My garden is good. It is good for the soul.'
(A Kate, parlando della gravidanza) 'I am afraid, Kate. Very afraid.'
(to Jin, in Korean, after Sayid repairs the transceiver) He is very smart. He can fix anything.
(A Sayid, con rispetto) 'You fixed it. Thank you, Sayid.'
